EmailTemplate.description: Notifies NZ Why Go user that GNG has been approved
EmailTemplate.name: ANZ Why Go Approval Notification - English
EmailTemplate.subject: GNG for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c} has been approved
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.ANZ_Approver__c} has approved the "Why Go" decision for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Opportunity__c} for {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Account__c}.
Link to your "Why go" Application: {!Go_No_Go_Conversation__c.Link}
